content: In PR #15616, I introduce a sequence of idempotent endomorphisms of the alternating face map complex of a simplicial object in a preadditive category. In a future PR, by taking the "limit" of this sequence, we shall get the projection on the normalized subcomplex, parallel to the degenerate sucomplex.
Joël Riou has marked this topic as resolved.
